channel.title: When bored what do you do on Grand Theft Auto
channel.description: :rolleyes: I'm bored right now so here's a forum to mess with that will be funny (I think) :|

item.title: When bored what do you do on Grand Theft Auto
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

I find bugs!

X) 2 Player mode, player 2 slices CJ’s head off, and when he respawns, NO HEAD OMG!
(Playstation 2 everyone of these)
X) 1 Player mode, you need 2 controllers. Plant bombs in 2 player spot, go standing there, press button in controller 2, EXPLODE REMOTE BOMBS BOOM after you have pressed.
Bug is, that game “thinks” does it go to 2 player mode, or hospital.
My game crashed/freezed.
X) 1 Player mode, get (REALLY) low hp, like this [[[[[[[[[[[[[[[]
[ = Lost health, ] = Health.
After that, go on roof of eg. Ammu-Nation, (any place you can go in) drop from roof to “yellow spot”.
Result: You die, walk in, stand 0.5-1 seconds, and die again.

Not great bugs, I know more bugs too.

Read full topic
item.source: When bored what do you do on Grand Theft Auto

item.title: When bored what do you do on Grand Theft Auto
item.dc:creator: @BrightWolf BrightWolf
item.description:
@BrightWolf wrote:

~I get to difficult places that have a good view of the street, cheat for ammo life and armor, than start shooting everything in sight. I see how long I can go before the cops can stop me.
~I find crazy jumps and stuff and see how many flips I can make my car do or something like that.
~I learned that I could hop off my motorcycle and it would keep going, so I’ve used that to mow down cops without getting stars before.
~It’s fun to see how many people you can carefully kill before you get a star.
~Punch cars until they explode. (it takes forever)
~set yourself on fire and run through the streets.
~Run from the cops in the ramp semi-truck, slam on the brakes, and watch cop cars fly over your head and explode because they almost never land right-side-up.
~Use the fire truck to hose people down the street.
~Make a car-bomb and drive around in an area where you’re likely to be car jacked. They take your car, you wave bye-bye and press the button.

Read full topic
item.source: When bored what do you do on Grand Theft Auto
